images.description: A minimalist line-art logo depicting the outline of a house in green, with subtle lighter green highlights on the door and two windows. Context: Found as the main logo on the website. Represents the company's focus on construction and building-related services. It is visually clean and scalable, suitable for web use.

A renovated two-story traditional cottage with a dark facade on the upper half and a light (likely white) plastered lower half. The house is situated in a rural, wooded area with green grass and trees in the background. Context: Found in the 'NAŠE POSLEDNÍ PROJEKTY' (Our Latest Projects) section, specifically for the 'OMLAZENÍ CHALUPY U TANVALDU' (Cottage Renovation near Tanvald) project. Shows a before/after type of project completion, highlighting the company's renovation capabilities. Good lighting and composition, showcasing the refreshed exterior.

A newly renovated residential house with a light-colored (off-white) plastered facade and a dark gray tiled roof. The house features several dark-framed windows and a small dormer window. Two cars are parked on the street in front of the house. Context: Found in the 'NAŠE POSLEDNÍ PROJEKTY' section, likely representing a completed house renovation project. The image is clear, well-lit by natural light, and shows the quality of the exterior work, including facade and roof. It effectively showcases a typical residential renovation.
